name: Mingus Jmpress
author: Cem Yıldız

sections.description:
This plugin developed for easily set up a page and conver it to slideshow with using jmpress.js (http://jmpressjs.github.io/jmpress.js/#/home)

All sub pages of selected page will be slide of its.

Easily set up for “Inline Attributes” (http://jmpressjs.github.io/docs/inline.html)
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload `mingusjmpress` to the `/wp-content/plugins/` directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place `[mingusjmpress]` shortcode in any page that you want to convert to be slideshow.
sections.faq:
Where is the settings

In the bottom of the admin menu
sections.changelog:
0.3

  • in admin page, preview screen has been added for slides overview.
  • fullscreen button added.

0.2

  • theme support has been extended (slide container moved to end of body. In some themes, some parts of design overs it.).
  • in admin menu, auto place option added to place slides automatically.
  • for data-x,data-y and data-z options, percentage values made acceptable.
  • in admin menu, font color option added.

0.1

  • first publish.
  • only allow to set “inline attributes”
